Module org.panteleyev.fx
Package org.panteleyev.fx

Class MenuFactory

java.lang.Object
org.panteleyev.fx.MenuFactory
public final class MenuFactory extends Object
This class provides convenience methods to create menus, menu items, etc.

    • newMenu

      @Deprecated(forRemoval=true) public static javafx.scene.control.Menu newMenu(String text, javafx.scene.control.MenuItem... items)

      use menu(String, MenuItem...) instead
      Creates new menu.

      text - menu text
      items - menu items
      Returns:
      menu

    • menu

      public static javafx.scene.control.Menu menu(String text, javafx.scene.control.MenuItem... items)
      Creates new menu. Null items are ignored which allows to create menu items optionally.
      Parameters:
      text - menu text
      items - menu items
      Returns:
      menu

    • menu

      public static javafx.scene.control.Menu menu(String text, javafx.scene.Node node, javafx.scene.control.MenuItem... items)
      Creates new menu. Null items are ignored which allows to create menu items optionally.
      Parameters:
      text - menu text
      node - menu image node
      items - menu items
      Returns:
      menu

    • menuBar

      public static javafx.scene.control.MenuBar menuBar(javafx.scene.control.Menu... menus)
      Creates new menu bar. useSystemMenuBar property is set to true.
      Parameters:
      menus - menus
      Returns:
      menu bar
